name: Social bot hook
author: Shahid Shaikh

sections.description:
Socialbot is upcoming SaaS platform for content sharing. This plugin helps us to retrieve random posts from the WordPress and expose it as JSON output using WordPress in-built REST API feature.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Is it secure ?

Of course, complete code is just of 25 LOC and hosted as open source so that you can go ahead and do a check.

short_description: This plugin acts as a hook for social bot SaaS platform for content automation sharing[Under development].
